> [toyata](#comment_26_17mM4YqSx7nMkYcePZB2GWcJBzkogWpqA1): Big Files are zn-native, which gives easy Tor protection which ipfs is missing.If @nofish now also implements autodownload/resume + decoupling of big files via a global hash-based identification mechanism, zn bigfiles would have surpassed ipfs.

Is this anywhere in the roadmap?

1555844108_19r2tS5GqeMQnxmyPq9ufD79LXoMV.body: Yes, some banks are actually looking to adopt blockchain to secure transactions.
